title: Persona
description: Persona is an application that captures an image then matches in AWS Rekognition API. The primary use case is for restaurants and bars to be able to provide more personalized service to their patrons.
technologies: AWS API, REACT, Mongo DB, Node.js, Express.js, AXIOS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Reactstrap, Bulma, GIT, GitHub

title: Animal Kingdom
description: Application matches pets that need homes with people best suited to take care of them!
technologies: Petfinder API, MySQL, Node.js, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, AJAX, HTML, CSS, Bulma, GIT, GitHub

title: Travel Lion
description: This application allows users to search for a Venues, Live Events and Weather within a certain radius based on there location
technologies: Google API, Yahoo weather API, Ticketmaster API, jQuery, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

title: Task Manager
description: Task Manager! is an app that lets users input the tasks, Responsible for task, Deadline, Priority and Description.
technologies: MySQL, Template literal, MVC, Node.js, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, AJAX, HTML, CSS

title: Christmas Trivia Game
description: The player will have a limited time length to finish the game. When the time runs out (regardless of whether or not they finished), the game will end and they will be shown the number of answers they got correct and incorrect

title: Wild Animals
description: Application use the GIPHY API to make a dynamic web page that populates with gifs of your choice. App calls the GIPHY API and use JavaScript and jQuery to change the HTML of the site.
technologies: GIPHY API, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS

title: Friend Finder
description: Friend-Finder is a dating app. This full-stack site will take in results your users' surveys, then compare their answers with those from other users. The app will then display the name and picture of the user with the best overall match.
technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, AJAX, Express.js, HTML, Bootstrap

title: Train Schedule
description: Accepts user input to add new train name, start time and frequency to schedule. Displays schedule in repeating table with next arrival based on current time and frequency of train stops. Stores Train info in Firebase for data persistence and retreives information from database on load.
technologies: Firebase, Moment.js, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

title: Eat-Da-Burger
description: You can create a burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. Being sure to follow the MVC design pattern; use Node and MySQL to query and route data in the app, and use Handlebars to generate your HTML.
technologies: MySQL, ORM, MVC, Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars, AJAX, JavaScript, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS

title: Node.JS apps
technologies: Node.js, Twitter API, OMDB API, Spotify API, MySQL, Express.js, NPM package

title: Crystal Game
description: Fun and interactive Crystal game for web browsers.
